DPT-235.Name: 235.xxx
DPT-235.Text: Signed value with classification and validity

Format.Name: DALI Device Address or DALI Group Address
Lower predef. pos. reached, typ. height 100 %, slats-angle < 100 %
Restriction of target height pos., pos. can not be reached
Restriction of slats height pos., pos. can not be reached
At least one of the inputs Wind-/Rain-/Frost-Alarm is ‘in alarm’
Up/down position is forced by MoveUpDownForced input
Movement is locked, e.g. by DeviceLocked input
Actuator setvalue is locally overridden, e.g. via a local user interface
General failure of the actuator or the drive
